questions.question: Is it safe to use your real personal information for an online character?

choices.answer: Yes, but only your name, address, and age.
Yes, but only once in a while.
It's better not to, even when creating an online character.

questions.question: Can you get an email scam from someone even if you never gave your email to that person?

choices.answer: No, you can only receive an email scam from someone you know
Yes, phishing scams use software to take other sources.
No, only friends and family know your email.

questions.question: Which of the following is a good tip to follow to avoid falling for scams?

choices.answer: Doing a web search for a company's name.
Sometimes a real way to win contests

questions.question: By entering your credit card in the "free coupon" pop-up after buying something online, you get

choices.answer: A $10 off coupon in your email
A $10 coupon with your next order
A repeating charge on your credit card from a weird company.

questions.question: Which of the following is a scam?

choices.answer: Become a laptop tester and get new free laptops each month!
Win a free Bauer hockey stick for filling out a survey!
Change your password immediately by clicking here!

questions.question: How do you know an email is really from a company you know?

choices.answer: Log-on to the site the way you normally would.
Click on the link in the email.

questions.question: If you receive a phishing email, you should...

choices.answer: Do nothing, it won't hurt anyone.
Reply to the email and tell the sender to stop.

questions.question: Preventative measures that can be used to prevent phishing are...

choices.answer: Thinking twice before opening all attachments or links.
Telling other people ways to protect themselves online.
People with firewalls on their computers

questions.question: Which industry do you think has seen a rise in phishing attempts in past years?
Sending personal information like a social security or credit card number by email is ok if...

choices.answer: It is to a well-known company
